report.title: Nondescript Report
report.author: Nobody
report.bodytext: I tried writing a 4 page trip report detailing my exact trip down to every detail, but then I realized that the only way attept to capture an event so profoundly bizarre is to write a poem while 1/15th at the edge of reality. /n /n I realize that is this website is designed to display catagorical data about drug use, but what I experienced can't be explained with normal language, in the same way that emotions cannot be expressed in normal language. /n /n The details of my set and setting are unimportant as I had no connection my earth bound exist for the 10 or so minutes that I was in the hard trip. But just for refrence, I was in a room with friends. /n /n /n /n /n Your mist tasted of strangeness /n the people said goodbye /n I was gripped into your depths /n at an alarming rate. /n My limbs were ripped off and I ceased to exist along with my friend, time. /n we saw god who was revealed as everybody in the room being ripped apart. /n tearing. everywhere. /n the true state of reality was chaos. /n I was being pulled and cracked -- god was breaking. /n I could not exist for much longer in this universe. The dark energy was too strong for me. /n Sudden I saw the puzzle pieces reforming. /n I wasn't ready to see into infinity so I was sent back. /n Maybe reality can be handled one frame at a time. but perhaps not all at once.
